## DisplayContainer class

Container for dynamically adding, removing, and repositioning objects for display.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class DisplayContainer 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [add(name, object, options)](./bge-core.displaycontainer.add.md) |  | Add a named child object, with optional display options. |
|  [addProperties(parent)](./bge-core.displaycontainer.addproperties.md) |  |  Adds all properties of <code>parent</code> annotated with <code>@display()</code>.  The value of each property will be fetched each time this container is rendered, so new values assigned after <code>addProperties()</code> is called will always be displayed. |
|  [addRange(name, objects, options)](./bge-core.displaycontainer.addrange.md) |  | Add a named array of child objects, with optional display options. |
|  [applyTransform(a, b)](./bge-core.displaycontainer.applytransform.md) | <code>static</code> | Applies transform <code>a</code> to transform <code>b</code>, returning the result. Neither <code>a</code> nor <code>b</code> are modified. |
|  [applyTransform(a, b, out)](./bge-core.displaycontainer.applytransform_1.md) | <code>static</code> | Applies transform <code>a</code> to transform <code>b</code>, storing the result in <code>out</code>. Neither <code>a</code> nor <code>b</code> are modified. |
|  [get(name)](./bge-core.displaycontainer.get.md) |  | Get a child by name. |
|  [get(name, index)](./bge-core.displaycontainer.get_1.md) |  | Get a child added with <code>addRange()</code>, by name and index. |
|  [render(ctx, parent, views)](./bge-core.displaycontainer.render.md) |  |  |
